Articles.Content:
I have no idea how I haven\'t heard of KSP before, and from what I\'ve played of it, it\'s awesome!

I currently cannot play it, but when my desktop comes in, I\'ll be playing it all the time, hopefully I can get out of the atmosphere without a massive explosion.

Looking forward to playing and then posting my trials, successful or not. Also, do I need to do that Captcha thing for every post?

Hi! Welcome to the forums!

The captcha is only for your first post to help protect against spam.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
